name: BullShoppe
description:
Customers need stuff.
You need money.
This is bull. 

Stock shelves, ring up customers, clean up messes, and try not to create more messes in the process. Welcome to Bullshoppe, where there’s always something to be done! Keep the shop tidy and you’ll be rewarded with new shops to tidy up and explore.

Mouse/keyboard and gamepad supported. Please feel free to give us your feedback so we can continue to make the game better in future updates.

“It’s unbullievabull!” - Us
